column2: Tenure is inversely proportional to the churn rate, As tenure increases, the churn rate decreases.
In terms of plan, we can see a customers with longer-term plans experience lower churn rates compared to those on shorter-term plans.
In terms of stage-wise churn rate established companies have higher churn rates compared to emerging companies.
Influencers have the highest churn rate, followed by entrepreneurs, while startups have the lowest churn rate.
